Articles.Content:
This isn't a role play, giving forum members ranks and what not, this is for those who would like to give ranks to their kerbals just so they can have a chain of command and some order but don't want to go to the trouble of making the ranks from scratch, well here you go, feel free to use them, edit them and do what ever, all i ask is that if you decide to use them besides within your save ie. for a YouTube series of similar that you give credit but other than that have fun :sticktongue:

here is the image:

click HERE to go to the website where you can download it (or save the image what ever)

(if you are a moderator please let me know if i am breaking any rules, ive checked them all and i believe i am withing boundaries here, if not message me and i will make the appropriate changes)

Edited December 29, 2013 by Tanner Rawlings
